Colors

Custom gray colors

Gray darkest - #4a4a4a - .text-gray-darkest

Custom graphite colors

Graphite dark - #394346 - .text-graphite-dark Graphite trout - #485357 - .text-graphite-trout Graphite - #505e62 - .text-graphite Graphite light - #7c8c94 - .text-graphite-light Graphite grayish blue - #d3d6db - .text-graphite-grayish-blue Graphite lighter - #ebeeef - .text-graphite-lighter Graphite lightest - #f6f8f9 - .text-graphite-lightest

Brand colors

Brand primary - #09acf8 - .text-primary Brand success - #48C248 - .text-success Brand info - #31e3ff - .text-info Brand warning - #f0ad4e - .text-warning Brand danger - #ff002d - .text-danger

Custom brand muted colors

Brand primary muted - #c3e9fe - .text-primary-muted Brand success muted - #8fddc6 - .text-success-muted Brand info muted - #c3ebfd - .text-info-muted Brand danger muted - #d69a98 - .text-danger-muted

</div>
